page.title: 05Police
page.content: Penyffordd is a small village of 5000 people.It has many farms and small estates are being built.The law and order is kept by a village police lady, WPC Ruth Purdy. She lives and works alone at Penyffordd police station.She has been there for 18 months.Her working hours range from 8.00 am to 6.00 pm or 6.00 pm to 2.00 am ,while having 2 days off per week ,which vary. WPC Purdy travels around Penyffordd by walking ,cycling or driving. The trouble comes from a wide selection of the community,but most crimes are connected with vandalism and commited by teenagers.There are no cells at the station and any law offender is taken to Mold or Hawarden police station .Reinforcements are called from Hawarden over her{U.H.F. {radio.}
